mapper.select: select id, postid, parent, email, url, ip, agent, content, approved, creator, createTime from comment where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(id,postid, parent, email, url, ip, agent,content,approved, creator, createTime) values(#{id},#{postid},#{parent},#{email},#{url},#{ip},#{agent},#{content},#{approved},#{creator},#{createTime})
